TopicDetails.title: Developing a system for the automated measuring of tail length and tail lesions of pigs at the slaughter line
TopicDetails.callTitle: Developing a system for the automated measuring of tail length and tail lesions of pigs at the slaughter line

programmeDivision.description: Preparatory Action on political participation and codetermination of the younger and older generations in Europe (PAYOG)

types.typeOfAction: PPPA Pilot Projects and Preparatory Actions

3449073.action: PPPA-ANIMAL-WELFARE-2022-TAIL-DOCKING - PPPA Pilot Projects and Preparatory Actions

TopicDetails.conditions:
Conditions
1. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: as described in section 5 and 6 of the Call document

* Proposal page limits and layout: Proposals are limited to maximum  (Part B; annexes do not count towards page limit). Evaluators will not consider any additional pages. Shorter proposals are welcome.

2. Eligible countries: as described in section 6 of the Call document.

3. Other eligibility conditions: as described in section 6 of the Call document.

4. Financial and operational capacity and exclusion: described in section 7 of the Call document.

5. Evaluation and award: Evaluation criteria, scoring, threshold and process are described in the Call document (see Section 8 and 9).

* Indicative timeline for evaluation and grant agreement: as described in the section 4 of the Call document

Call opening: 15 September 2022

Deadline for submission: 15 December 2022- 17:00:00 CET

Evaluation: January 2023

Information on evaluation results:February 2023

GA signature:March 2023 

6. Legal and financial set-up of the grants: described in section 10 of the Call document

7.  Proposal templates, guidance and model grant agreements (MGA):

- Call document

- Standard application form

- Detailed budget table

-Mono/Multi beneficiary Model Grant Agreement

8. Additional Documents:

- Commission Decision C(2022) 3319 final of 25.5.2022 on the financing of the preparatory action ’Developing a system for the automated measuring of tail length and tail lesions of pigs at the slaughter line’

- EU Financial Regulation 2018/1046
TopicDetails.supportInfo:
For help related to this call, please contact:HADEA-FOOD-GRANTS@ec.europa.eu

 

Funding & Tenders Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals.

IT Helpdesk – Contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Online Manual – Step-by-step online guide through the Portal processes from proposal preparation and submission to reporting on your on-going project. Valid for all 2021-2027 programmes.
TopicDetails.sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service, please click on the submission-button next to the type of action and the type of model grant agreement that corresponds to your proposal. You will then be asked to confirm your choice, as it cannot be changed in the submission system. Upon confirmation, you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Funding & Tenders Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
